title: The classification of non-K\"ahler Calabi-Yau geometries on threefolds
authors: Vestislav Apostolov, Kuan-Hui Lee and Jeffrey Streets
abstract:
We show that a compact Hermitian manifold $(M^6, \omega, J)$ such that
$\omega$ is pluriclosed with vanishing Bismut-Ricci form is either K\"ahler
Calabi-Yau or Bismut-flat, and hence a quotient of either $SU(2) \times \mathbb
R \times \mathbb C$ or $SU(2) \times SU(2)$.
